parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The ID of the vendor.

parameter.name: syncToken
parameter.description: Version number of the entity.

parameter.name: isSparse
parameter.description: Boolean value to specify weather the update is a full or sparse update.

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Title of the person.

parameter.name: givenName
parameter.description: Given name or first name of a person.

parameter.name: middleName
parameter.description: Middle name of the person.

parameter.name: familyName
parameter.description: Family name or the last name of the person.

parameter.name: suffix
parameter.description: Suffix of the name.

parameter.name: companyName
parameter.description: The name of the company associated with the person or organization.

parameter.name: displayName
parameter.description: The name of the person or organization as displayed.

parameter.name: printOnCheckName
parameter.description: Name of the person or organization as printed on a check.

parameter.name: active
parameter.description: If true, this entity is currently enabled for use by QuickBooks.

parameter.name: primaryPhone
parameter.description: Primary phone number.

parameter.name: alternatePhone
parameter.description: Alternate phone number.

parameter.name: mobile
parameter.description: Mobile phone number.

parameter.name: fax
parameter.description: Fax number.

parameter.name: primaryEmailAddr
parameter.description: Primary email address.

parameter.name: webAddr
parameter.description: Website address.

parameter.name: billAddr
parameter.description: Billing address of the vendor.

parameter.name: otherContactInfo
parameter.description: List of ContactInfo entities of any contact info type.

parameter.name: taxIdentifier
parameter.description: Tax ID of the Person or Organization.

parameter.name: termRef
parameter.description: Reference to a terms associated with the vendor.

parameter.name: balance
parameter.description: Specifies the amount the company owes to this vendor.

parameter.name: accountNumber
parameter.description: Name or number of the account associated with this vendor.

parameter.name: isVendor1099
parameter.description: Whether the vendor belong to 1099-MISC contract or not.

parameter.name: currencyRef
parameter.description: Reference to the currency in which all the business transactions created for or received from that vendor are created.
